verses.verse: Josiah <S%H2977><s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>; and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3040>Jedidah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> of <S%H1218>Bozkath<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and turned not <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H683>Azaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that he may <S%H8552>sum<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> which is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> have <S%H622>gathered<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>:

and let them <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6213>the<s%> <S%H4399>workmen<s%> that have the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and let them <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H6213>the<s%> <S%H4399>workmen<s%> that are in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>,

unto the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%>, and to the <S%H1129>builders<s%>, and to the <S%H1443>masons<s%>, and for <S%H7069>buying<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H4274>hewn<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.
Howbeit there was no reckoning <S%H2803>made<s%> with them of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>; for they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H530>faithfully<s%>.

And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, I have <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and he read <S%H7121>it<s%>.

And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5413>emptied<s%> out the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6213>the<s%> <S%H4399>workmen<s%> that have the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> me a <S%H5612>book<s%>. And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
And it came to <S%H4428>pass<s%>, when the king had <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4320>Micaiah<s%>, and <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H1875>ye<s%>, inquire of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for <S%H5971>me<s%>, and for the people, and for all <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, concerning the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%>; for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that is <S%H3341>kindled<s%> against <S%H1>us<s%>, because our fathers have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H5612>book<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> according unto all that which is written concerning <S%H3789>us<s%>.

So <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H296>Ahikam<s%>, and <S%H5907>Achbor<s%>, and <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%>, <S%H3212>went<s%> unto <S%H2468>Huldah<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess<s%>, the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8616>Tikvah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2745>Harhas<s%>, <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H899>wardrobe<s%> (now she <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the second <S%H4932>quarter<s%>); and they communed with <S%H1696>her<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H559>Tell<s%> ye the <S%H376>man<s%> that sent you unto <S%H7971>me<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H1697>thereof<s%>, even all the words of the <S%H5612>book<s%> which the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> hath <S%H7121>read<s%>.

Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H6999>me<s%>, and have burned incense unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, that they might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, therefore my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall be <S%H3341>kindled<s%> against this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>.

But unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, who <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thus shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: As touching the <S%H1697>words<s%> which thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%>,

because thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H7401>tender<s%>, and thou didst <S%H3665>humble<s%> thyself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> what I <S%H1696>spake<s%> against this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> <S%H8047>thereof<s%>, that they should become a desolation and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, and hast <S%H7167>rent<s%> thy <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8085>me<s%>; I also have heard <S%H5002>thee<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Therefore <S%H622><s%>, behold, I will gather thee to thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to thy <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>, neither shall thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>. And they <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.
